name: The Institute for Law and the Web at the University of Southampton
bossPosition: Director of ILAWS, Asst. Professor in IT / IP Law
goal: ILAWS was established as an academic research centre in 2006 to examine the legal issues, problems and opportunities associated with the Internet, the Web and digital technology. It now has six full time members of staff, four visiting research fellows, as well as several research students, doing research in key areas of IT and intellectual property law. As well as teaching, our academics write textbooks and articles for leading journals. They also work closely with colleagues in the University of Southampton and beyond in disciplines such as cyber security, psychology, web science etc.
euInitiatives: All main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files regarding IT and IP law.
